name: THCredentials
desc: A class that contains credentials for a Thread network.

items.name: var activeOperationalDataSet: Data?
items.desc: The essential operational parameters for the Thread network.

items.name: var borderAgentID: Data?
items.desc: The identifer of an active Thread network Border Agent.

items.name: var extendedPANID: Data?
items.desc: The Thread network extended PAN identifier.

items.name: var pskc: Data?
items.desc: The Thread network pre-shared key for the Commissioner.

items.name: var creationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time that the framework stored the credential in the database.

items.name: var lastModificationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time that the framework updated the credential in the database.
